mapper.select: SELECT article_id AS articleId ,article_title AS articleTitle FROM article ORDER BY article_id DESC
SELECT article_id AS articleId ,article_title AS articleTitle ,article_content AS articleContent FROM article WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
